Hi-Fi Quad DAC lets every detail move you. 
Enjoy higher quality audio through wired headphones or speakers for crisper, fuller playback by reducing 50% white noise. V20 supports you not only to hear max. 32bit/384KHz almost every kind of audio files, but also to up-sample the files up to 32bit.
